topic.title: ZeroNet is a good concept but it has a VERY long way to go.
topic.body: It is not like a mirror of the Internet, and it should be, only decentralized. The urls are too long to unable to be remembered, also personal .json files are required on the device accessing it, instead the .json files should be stored on ZeroNet itself, so users can login anywhere, from any browser.

9_12i4LiZ39NxcYtsf36aTWJzcpzw4KFUCJy.body: Basically, Democrat Party is the Rothschild's (who own the World Bank) scheme to cause degeneracy in America, and to use immigrants as weapons against America. The Rothschilds seek to destroy America using the Democrat Party. The Republican Party, now basically a new party after having thrown out their old scums, such as the NeoCons, Jeb!, and Lyin' Ted Cruz, will NOT allow the Rothschilds to destroy America.

Hillary murdered our brave Americans in Benghazi by telling the rescue team not to go in, and then lied and said no Americans died there. Hillary is a Piece Of Crap. She stole 100 BILLION from charities by funneling money meant for charities through the Clinton Foundation, and while Secretary Of State, set up an illegal email server to hide this scheme. Hillary has a brain tumor, brain damage and is also very stupid. She was given only a year to live by medical professionals. Therefore, Hillary WILL NOT become president.
